contents:
168 Upwards of 90% of job applications sent by Gen Z college grads in STEM fields are denied.

We have plenty of talented people here.

Greed cannot come before our nation’s children. posted 16 hours ago by PiratePatriotParrot 4 comments award share report block Gabe Guidarini @GabeGuidarini • 20h Upwards of 90% of job applications sent by Gen Z college grads in STEM fields are denied. We have plenty of talented people here. Greed cannot come before our nation’s children.

They are the most libshit generation in history and they aren't "turning on Trump" because they never voted for Trump.
